text: The Komala Party of Iranian Kurdistan – Reunification Faction () simply known as the Komala – Reunification Faction, is an armed communist and separatist ethnic party of Kurds in Iran, currently exiled in northern Iraq. It split from the Komala Party of Iranian Kurdistan on 29 April 2008 over internal disagreements and is led by Abdulla Konaposhi. == History == ==See also== ==References== Category:2008 establishments in Iraq Category:Banned communist parties Category:Banned Kurdish parties Category:Banned political parties in Iran Category:Communist militant groups Category:Communist parties in Iran Category:Communist parties in Iraq Category:Marxist parties Category:Kurdish political parties in Iran Category:Kurdish political parties in Iraq Category:Left-wing militant groups in Iran Category:Militant opposition to the Islamic Republic of Iran Category:Organisations designated as terrorist by Iran Category:Political parties in Kurdistan Region
title: Komala Party of Iranian Kurdistan – Reunification Faction
